price: 17. And We have indeed made the Qur’ân easy to understand and remember; then is there any one who will remember (or receive admonition)?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
